amendment.description: To transfer the building at 5401 NW Broken Sound Boulevard, Boca Raton, Florida and all improvement thereon to the Administrator of the General Services Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 10 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1432) To transfer the building at 5401 NW Broken Sound Boulevard, Boca Raton, Florida and all improvement thereon to the Administrator of the General Services Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 10 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nelson FL.
